Package com.bsandersen.CabConverter

Package Overview

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ADIFparser This class provides a simple ADIF parser suitable for extracting data from MacLoggerDX exported .ADIF files.
ADIFrecord ADIFrecord This class is used to create objects that hold QSO information.
CabFileNode This class contains the details for a given field of a QSO record or a heading line within a Cabrillo file.
CabrilloLine This class contains all the information for a given line of text (not a QSO line) within a Cabrillo file.
CabrilloQSO This class holds the details for the Cabrillo QSO formatting as presecribed by this contest's XML file.
CCUI The CCUI class is the parent class to the user interface for CabConverter.
Contest Holds the root of the contest descriptor as captured from the XML file.
ContestDetails Provides the UI space for the contest-specific data entry including the selection of the contest itself.
GenerateCabrilloListener This small class is used to handle the user's request to generate a Cabrillo file.
LogViewer This class provides a means of viewing the contents of an imported ADIF file.
OpenAdifItemListener This object is invoked when the File->Open command is issued.
PersonalData This object provides a portion of the UI relating to the display, retrieveal, and saving of personal data.
PreferencesManager User preferences such as their call sign, name, address, etc., are stored in a standard Java preferences backing store managed by this object.
SavePreferencesListener This class provides a way to save and retrieve the user personal information and preferences.
UIElement Contains the details for one UI element as specified in the contest XML file.
Version Holds the version of the software.
XMLparser This is the interface to the XML parser facility in Java used to consume the contest description files.
 

Enum Summary
UIElement.ElementType UI elements have specific types that are then mapped to user interface components within the contest panel.
 

Package com.bsandersen.CabConverter Description

Package Overview

This package (com.bsandersen.CabConverter) contains the logic for CabConverter, the amateur radio contest utility used to convert radio log files in the standard .adif format to a generalized format called Cabrillo. This program is the second generation of the utility made public. The original program (CabConverter 1.x) was distributed and supported within the Yahoo! Group Cab-converter. (Membership is required to gain access to files or messages.)

There is significant documentation on program requirements, usage, and ways to extend the program through additional contest recipes within the "Documentation" folder.


CabConverter 2 by B. Scott Andersen is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. Permissions beyond the scope of this license may be available at http://www.bsandersen.com.
